sentences: In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBI/2009/L.3/Rev.1 ), the SBI recommends a draft decision for adoption by COP 15, which, inter alia , decides: to reconstitute the CGE for a period of three years from 2010-2012; that the CGE s membership shall remain the same; and that the terms and the mandate of the CGE and the need for its continuation shall be reviewed at COP 17.
It encourages regional groups to make all efforts to ensure balanced representation of expertise.
An annex containing the CGE s terms of reference is attached to the draft COP decision.
